verses.name: Jeremiah 28:15
verses.text: Then said the prophet Jeremiah unto Hananiah the prophet, Hear now, Hananiah; The Lord hath not sent thee; but thou makest this people to trust in a lie.

verses.name: Jeremiah 28:16
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord; Behold, I will cast thee from off the face of the earth: this year thou shalt die, because thou hast taught rebellion against the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 28:17
verses.text: So Hananiah the prophet died the same year in the seventh month.
